mapper.select: SELECT biomass_stove.*,co.COUNTY_NAME,co.city_code,co.city_name,SUBSTR(biomass_stove.scc_code,1,2) AS scc1,SUBSTR(biomass_stove.scc_code,3,2) AS scc2, SUBSTR(biomass_stove.scc_code,5,3) AS scc3,SUBSTR(biomass_stove.scc_code,8,3) AS scc4 FROM biomass_stove LEFT JOIN ( SELECT county.COUNTY_ID,county.COUNTY_NAME,city.city_name,city.city_code FROM county LEFT JOIN city ON county.city_code=city.city_code ) co ON co.COUNTY_ID=biomass_stove.county_id where biomass_stove.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into biomass_stove
id,
year,
county_id,
stove_type,
CROP_TYPE,
CROP_YIELD,
scc_code,
source_descrip,
GRASS_VALLEY_RATIO,
BURNING_RATIO_stove,
note,
pm10_emission,
pm25_emission,
co_emission,
voc_emission,
pm_emission,
so2_emission,
nox_emission,
nh3_emission,
oc_emission,
bc_emission,

#{year,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{countyId,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{stoveType,jdbcType=CHAR},

insert into biomass_stove (id, year, county_id, stove_type, CROP_TYPE, CROP_YIELD, scc_code, source_descrip, GRASS_VALLEY_RATIO, BURNING_RATIO_stove, note, pm10_emission, pm25_emission, co_emission, voc_emission, pm_emission, so2_emission, nox_emission, nh3_emission, oc_emission, bc_emission ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{countyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{stoveType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cropType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cropYield,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{sccCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sourceDescrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grassValleyRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{burningRatioStove,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{vocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pmEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, year = #{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, county_id = #{countyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, stove_type = #{stoveType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CROP_TYPE = #{cropType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CROP_YIELD = #{cropYield,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, scc_code = #{sccCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, source_descrip = #{sourceDescrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRASS_VALLEY_RATIO = #{grassValleyRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, BURNING_RATIO_stove = #{burningRatioStove,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pm10_emission = #{pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pm25_emission = #{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, co_emission = #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, voc_emission = #{vocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pm_emission = #{pmEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, so2_emission = #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nox_emission = #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nh3_emission = #{nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, oc_emission = #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bc_emission = #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}
mapper.update:
update biomass_stove
year = #{year,jdbcType=CHAR},
county_id = #{countyId,jdbcType=CHAR},
stove_type = #{stoveType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CROP_TYPE = #{cropType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CROP_YIELD = #{cropYield,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
scc_code = #{sccCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
source_descrip = #{sourceDescrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRASS_VALLEY_RATIO = #{grassValleyRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
BURNING_RATIO_stove = #{burningRatioStove,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pm10_emission = #{pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pm25_emission = #{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
co_emission = #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
voc_emission = #{vocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pm_emission = #{pmEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
so2_emission = #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
nox_emission = #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
nh3_emission = #{nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
oc_emission = #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
bc_emission = #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
